summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an FBI contact, forwarding a discovery request from Noel's counsel and asking if the FBI currently has any responsive information. It indicates ongoing discovery proceedings in a case involving someone named Noel.

persons.name: Noel
persons.context: The email references discovery requests from Noel's counsel, indicating Noel is involved in a legal proceeding where discovery is being sought.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is requesting information from the FBI regarding discovery items related to Noel's case.

connections.description: The AUSA is handling a case involving Noel, as evidenced by the forwarding of discovery requests from Noel's counsel.

events.title: Discovery Request from Noel's Counsel
events.description: A letter from Noel's counsel was sent requesting additional discovery, referenced as items 1-13.

events.title: AUSA Inquiry to FBI
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emailed an FBI contact to inquire if the FBI currently has any notes, reports, or information responsive to the discovery requests from Noel's counsel.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: On March 2, 2020, an AUSA contacted the FBI regarding discovery in a case involving an individual named Noel.
The discovery requests (items 1-13) originated from a letter dated January 24, 2020, sent by Noel's counsel.
The AUSA specifically asked if the FBI CURRENTLY possesses any responsive information, emphasizing they were not requesting new investigation.
The communication indicates ongoing federal legal proceedings in the Southern District of New York related to Noel.
